attributes.action: End The UK'S Membership Of The World Health Organization
attributes.additional_details:
We The People Did Not Vote For Inclusion In This Organization. 
Withdraw Immediately From Any Contract Now And Always.
attributes.background: This organization does not have the best interests of the UK population with its intentions to enforce medical rules and laws cannot be allowed to stand.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

End the UK’s membership of the World Health Organisation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714790
